subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Eugene Harvey made a free throw with five seconds left to help Seton Hall beat No. 19 Southern California, 63-61, in the Puerto Rico Tip-Off on Thursday night in San Juan.
snippet: Eugene Harvey made a free throw with five seconds left to help Seton Hall beat No. 19 Southern California, 63-61, in the Puerto Rico Tip-Off on Thursday night in San Juan.
